title: How MN education bill could affect school nurses, counselors
description: Jim Bierma, lead counselor for Minneapolis Public Schools, joined MPR News' Tom Weber to discuss how funding might shake out in the final version of the bill.

Dateline:
In Minnesota's education bill, there was a push for more money specifically allocated to spend on school support staff, including nurses, counselors, mental health works and social workers.
